title: Pets at Home names new CFO - Retail Gazette
summary:
- Pets at Home has appointed Sarah Pollard as the new CFO, succeeding Mike Iddon, who will remain until spring 2026.
- Pollard brings extensive experience from her previous roles at PZ Cussons and Nomad Foods, as well as experience in retail finance at Tesco.
- The appointment follows a leadership change with the recent departure of CEO Lyssa McGowan, amid a second profit outlook reduction for the year.
- Ian Burke, executive chair, praised Iddonâ€™s contributions, highlighting significant revenue growth and shareholder returns during his tenure.
- Pollard expressed enthusiasm about leading the company forward, emphasizing its strong market position and commitment to creating shareholder value.
